    Tips & Tricks

    Daniel Klotz

    09_tips.Rmd

    This chapter provides useful tricks, scripts and functions, that are not part of coscos or visCOS but are still handy for working with COSERO.

      library(magrittr)

    Get last n letters of a character from the right:

    substr_right <- function(x, n){
  # author: Simon Frey
  #
  # x ... character vector
  # n ... number of letters to extract

  substr(x, nchar(x)-n+1, nchar(x))
}
substr_right("abcdefgh",5) %>% print(.)
    ## [1] "defgh"

    Transform \(mm\) into \(\frac{m^3}{s}\).

    mm_to_m3s <- function(input, area = 1000, dt = 1) {
  # author: Simon Frey
  #
  # input ... Runoff in mm
  # area ... Area in m^2
  # dt ... timesetp in sec
  # output ... runoff m^3*s^-1

  return(output = input/(dt*1000)*area)
}
mm_to_m3s(1000,1,1) %>% print(.)
    ## [1] 1

    Transform \(\frac{m^3}{s}\) into \(mm\).

    m3s_to_mm <- function(input, area = 1000, dt = 1) {
  # author: Simon Frey
  #
  # input ... Runoff in m^3*s^-1
  # area ... Area in m^2
  # dt ... timesetp in sec
  # output ... runoff mmm

  return(output = input*1000*dt/area)
}
m3s_to_mm(1,1,1) %>% print(.)
    ## [1] 1000

    Check if a give year is a leap year

    is_leapyear = function(year) {
  # author: Simon Frey
  return(((year %% 4 == 0) & (year %% 100 != 0)) | (year %% 400 == 0))
}

    Developed by Daniel Klotz.
